name: documenso
description: Documenso is an open-source, self-hosted e-signature solution. It lets you upload documents, place signature fields, invite signers, and track status from a modern web UI, providing a privacy-friendly alternative to commercial signing platforms.

features.title: Team Collaboration
features.description: Multiple users can edit documents simultaneously with live cursor tracking and conflict resolution to streamline

features.title: Search and Filter
features.description: Full-text search across all content with filters, tags, and metadata indexing to quickly locate specific

features.title: REST API
features.description: RESTful API endpoints for third-party integrations and automated workflows to extend platform functionality

features.title: Analytics Dashboard
features.description: Visual metrics and usage statistics with customizable charts to track performance and user engagement

features.title: Mobile Responsive
features.description: Responsive design with touch-friendly interfaces and offline sync capabilities for seamless mobile access

features.title: Email Notifications
features.description: Configurable alerts via email, push, or in-app notifications to keep users informed of important updates

features.title: Theme Customization
features.description: Multiple UI themes and layout options with custom branding support to match organizational identity
